fields.web_text: • KOK - German nationwide activist coordination group combating trafficking in women and violence against women in the process of migration +49 30 263 911 76
• Call 0 825 009 907: National Coordination for protection of victims of human trafficking hotline
fields.sms_text: Call 0 825 009 907: National Coordination for protection of victims of human trafficking hotline

fields.web_text: • Call free on 0800 555 111 anytime for help for victims of human trafficking.
fields.sms_text: In the UK, call 0800 555 111 anytime for help.
